title: Homepage Loads Correctly with All Sections
description: Verify that the homepage loads with the hero section, rotating text animation, and featured projects showcase visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL.
Confirm the hero section is visible with title, description, image, and action buttons.
Verify the rotating text animation cycles through texts smoothly and respects reduced motion preference.
Check featured projects section displays project cards with correct images and certification badges.

title: Rotating Text Animation Accessibility and Performance
description: Validate rotating text animation has smooth rotation with configurable interval and supports accessibility features.

steps.description: Enable reduced motion settings on the device.
Load homepage and observe rotating text animation behavior.
Verify that animation respects reduced motion preference by minimizing or disabling animation.
Measure animation rotation interval consistency.
Confirm the text changes at configurable intervals smoothly without jank.

title: About Page Content and Resume Download
description: Check About page renders personal background, tool stack, skills visualization, and enables resume download.

steps.description: Navigate to the About page.
Verify the display of personal background text.
Check tool stack and skills visualization elements render correctly.
Click the resume download link/button.
Confirm the resume file is downloaded successfully and is accessible.

title: Contact Page Form Validation and Submission
description: Ensure the contact form validates input fields and provides appropriate feedback on successful or failed submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact page.
Attempt to submit the form with empty required fields.
Verify validation errors are displayed for missing required fields.
Input invalid formats (e.g., invalid email) into the form fields.
Check validation errors for invalid formats are shown.
Fill the form correctly with valid name, email, and message.
Submit the form.
Confirm the user receives submission success feedback.

title: Contact Page Direct Contact Links and Calendly Integration
description: Verify that direct contact info links (email, phone) are clickable and Calendly scheduling widget works as expected.

steps.description: Open the Contact page.
Ensure email and phone links use correct protocols (mailto:, tel:).
Click the email link and verify mail client opens.
Click the phone link and verify phone dialer opens on supported devices.
Check that the Calendly widget loads and is interactive.
Attempt to schedule a meeting via the Calendly widget.
Verify scheduling process completes or Calendly integration flow is properly initialized.

title: Projects Showcase Page Project Cards Display and Hover Effects
description: Verify project cards are displayed with images, descriptions, and certification badges, and hover effects activate correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects showcase page.
Confirm all project cards are visible with images and certification badges.
Hover over each project card.
Verify hover effects activate smoothly and links to project detail pages are placeholders and non-broken.

title: Services Page Service Cards and Call-to-Action
description: Validate that service cards with clear descriptions are displayed and CTAs navigate to contact page.

steps.description: Open Services page.
Verify all service cards render with appropriate descriptions.
Click the CTA button on each service card.
Confirm navigation redirects to the Contact page.

title: Responsive Header Navigation and Mobile Menu
description: Check header navigation functions correctly on desktop and mobile with sticky behavior and mobile menu toggling.

steps.description: Visit the website on desktop viewport.
Confirm header navigation is visible, links navigate correctly, and sticky behavior works on scroll.
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions.
Verify mobile menu button is visible.
Toggle mobile menu open and close.
Check menu toggling animation is smooth and navigation links are accessible.

title: Footer Displays Site Info and Responsive Social & Legal Links
description: Ensure footer includes site information, social media links, legal links, and is responsive across device sizes.

steps.description: Scroll to the footer section on various pages.
Confirm footer displays relevant site info and copyright.
Verify social media icons and links are clickable and correct.
Check legal links navigate to correct legal page.
Test footer responsiveness on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.
Footer layout adjusts appropriately without content overlap or truncation.

title: Content Management Using Typed Content Files
description: Test that content can be updated through typed content files and reflects correctly on the web pages without code changes.

steps.description: Modify content in a typed content file for a visible section (e.g., About page text).
Build and deploy the site reflecting new content.
Verify updated content renders correctly on the related page.
Check no UI breakage or code errors occur after content update.

title: Performance Metrics Validation
description: Confirm that the site meets performance criteria including LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1, and Lighthouse score above 90.

steps.description: Run Lighthouse performance audit on homepage and key pages.
Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is under 2.5 seconds.
Confirm First Input Delay (FID) is under 100 milliseconds.
Ensure Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) score is less than 0.1.
Check overall Lighthouse performance score is above 90.

title: Accessibility Compliance for WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Validate that all core pages meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

steps.description: Use keyboard-only navigation to interact with all navigable elements on homepage, About, Contact, Projects, and Services pages.
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Run screen reader on pages to review content reading order and meaningful labels.
Confirm all images, buttons, links, and form inputs have appropriate aria-labels or accessible names.
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards across the site.

title: SEO Best Practices Implementation
description: Ensure that meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and other SEO features are correctly implemented across the website.

steps.description: Inspect page source for presence of appropriate meta tags including title, description, and keywords.
Verify structured data (JSON-LD) is present and valid on key pages.
Access sitemap.xml file.
Confirm all core pages are listed in sitemap.
Check robots.txt file exists and correctly configured.

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: Verify site functionality, layout, and animations work correctly on latest versions of major browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

steps.description: Open the website on latest Chrome browser.
Perform smoke tests for page loading, navigation, and animations.
Repeat on latest Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.
Confirm no visual or functional regressions across browsers.

title: Responsive Design Across Mobile, Tablet, Desktop
description: Test that the website layout, navigation menus, CTAs, and interactive animations adapt correctly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: View site on mobile viewport.
Check navigation collapses to mobile menu and touch targets are appropriately sized.
Verify content fits screen dimensions without horizontal scroll.
Switch to tablet viewport and repeat layout, navigation, and content checks.
Switch to desktop viewport and verify full desktop layout.

title: Error Handling for Form Submission Failures
description: Validate that the contact form gracefully handles submission errors such as network failures or server errors with user-friendly messages.

steps.description: Fill the contact form with valid data.
Simulate server error or network failure during form submission.
Verify an appropriate error message is shown to the user.
Ensure form inputs remain populated to allow user resubmission.

title: Consistent Accessible CTA Buttons Across Site
description: Verify that all CTA buttons across pages use consistent styling, are keyboard accessible, and have meaningful labels.

steps.description: Review CTA buttons on homepage, services, about, contact, and projects pages.
Confirm consistent visual styling for all CTA buttons.
Check buttons are reachable and actionable via keyboard navigation.
Validate buttons have accessible names or aria-labels describing their action.
